fields.name: Phase zur Einreichung von Ideen
fields.description: Anlegen und Kommentieren neuer Ideen.

fields.name: What ideas do you suggest for funding?
fields.description: You can enter your proposal on the map and comment on the proposals of the other participants.

fields.name: Which of the submitted proposals would you like to support?
fields.description: The proposals with the most supporters will be examined and will then be put to the final vote.

fields.name: Which of the proposals do you think should be implemented?
fields.description: You can vote for up to 5 proposals. To do so, please enter the voting code.

fields.name: What are your ideas?
fields.description: You can enter your own ideas on the map and comment on the ideas of the other participants.

fields.name: What are your ideas?
fields.description: You can create your own ideas and comment on and rate the ideas of the other participants.

fields.name: What ideas do you suggest for funding?
fields.description: You can enter your proposal on the map and comment on and rate the proposals of the other participants.

fields.name: What do you think about these ideas/topics?
fields.description: You can comment on and rate the ideas/topics.

fields.name: What do you think about these places/suggestions?
fields.description: You can comment and rate the places/suggestions.

fields.name: What do you think about the draft?
fields.description: You can comment on the draft paragraph by paragraph or as a whole.

fields.name: Voting phase
fields.description: Answer the questions and comment on the poll.

fields.name: Do you have questions?
fields.description: You can add your questions and support the questions of other participants. To allow different people to have their say, please indicate which group you feel you belong to.
